title: Cape Cod National Seashore: NEED program
body: NEED program         The National Park Service residential environmental education program at Cape Cod National Seashore, known as the NEED program, offers educational groups an opportunity to experience the many natural and historical wonders of Cape Cod on a multi-day basis. National Park Service  On October 7, 2013 the National Park Service will commence a rehabilitation and strategic planning process for the education facility at Coast Guard Beach, Eastham. The building will be closed for one to two years for rehabilitation and to determine how it will be used in the future to meet National Park Service mission goals.
